pageList.title: Welcome my Friend!
pageList.content:
Here is a selection of engaging stories in your target language.

Let us not indulge, and jump straight into your first reading!

touchTranslate.title: Did you know?
touchTranslate.content:
Click on any word to open the Instant Translation.

You can then add it to your Personal Vocabulary and practice it with specific exercises!

googleTranslate.title: Did you know?
googleTranslate.content:
You can translate each sentence by clicking on the icon on the right.

This gives you a better Translation Context that is often unavailable when translating single words.
